```{r}
tri <- read.csv("../../STAT5225/Data/triangles.csv", header = F)
colnames(tri) <- c("T1", "T2", "T3")
head(tri)
```

```{r}
len <- dim(tri)[1]
for (i in 1:len){
  if (tri[i,1] > tri[i,2] + tri[i,3] | tri[i,2] > tri[i,1] + tri[i,3] | tri[i,3] > tri[i,1] + tri[i,2]){
    tri[i,4] <- 0
  }
  else{
    tri[i,4] <- 1
  }
}
head(tri)

```

```{r}
colnames(tri) <- c("T1", "T2", "T3", "isTriangle")
write.csv(tri$isTriangle, file = "isTriangle.csv",row.names =F)
```
